sentences.english: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 我恨惡惡人的會，必不與惡人同坐。

sentences.english: Withdraw thy foot from thy neighbour's house; lest he be weary of thee, and so hate thee.
sentences.chinese: 你的腳要少進鄰舍的家，恐怕他厭煩你，恨惡你。

sentences.english: You hate my instruction and cast my words behind you.
sentences.chinese: 其實你恨惡管教，將我的言語丟在背後。

sentences.english: The accomplice of a thief is his own enemy.
sentences.chinese: 與盜賊分贓，是恨惡自己的性命。

sentences.english: 5I abhor the assembly of evildoers and refuse to sit with the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 我恨惡惡人的會，必不與惡人同坐。

sentences.english: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.
sentences.chinese: 願恨惡錫安的，都蒙羞退後。

sentences.english: Too long have I lived among those who hate peace.
sentences.chinese: 我與那恨惡和睦的人，許久同住。

sentences.english: Seldom set foot in your neighbor's house- too much of you, and he will hate you.
sentences.chinese: 你的腳要少進鄰舍的家，恐怕他厭煩你，恨惡你。

sentences.english: I have nothing but hatred for them; I count them my enemies.
sentences.chinese: 我切切地恨惡他們，以他們爲仇敵。

sentences.english: We must hate sin because God hates sin.
sentences.chinese: 我們應當恨惡罪，因爲神恨惡罪。

sentences.english: We must hate sin because God hates sin.
sentences.chinese: 我們應當恨惡罪，因爲神恨惡罪。

sentences.english: But now they have seen these miracles, and yet they have hated both me and my Father.
sentences.chinese: 但如今連我與我的父，他們也看見也恨惡了。

sentences.english: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace.
sentences.chinese: 我與那恨惡和睦的人，許久同住。

sentences.english: Seeing thou hatest instruction, and casteth my words behind thee.
sentences.chinese: 其實你恨惡管教，將我的言語丟在背後。
